definitions.definition: (economics) the utilization of economic goods to satisfy needs or in manufacturing
(psychology) an automatic pattern of behavior in reaction to a specific situation
exerting shrewd or devious influence especially for one's own advantage
(law) the exercise of the legal right to enjoy the benefits of owning property
seek or achieve an end by using to one's advantage
habitually do something or be in a certan state or place (use only in the past tense)
